Name: Large
Description: You are larger than normal for your people.
Effect: Advantage on STR checks; Strength-based attacks deal +1 dmg.

Name: Innate Source
Description: You were born with a dangerous abundance of magic.
Effect: Unlock Magic (Pillar: Energy/Matter). Ability: Overchannel (Cast Tier+1 but take HP Dmg).

Name: Magical Companion
Description: You share your soul with a magical beast or drone.
Effect: Unlock Magic. Companion has own Actions but shares your Mana Pool. If they die you lose Magic.

Name: Mana Siphon
Description: You are a Void-Soul; you cannot generate magic only take it.
Effect: Unlock Magic. 0 Natural Mana Regen. Action: 'Drain' to steal Mana from life/tech.

Name: Chosen One
Description: A higher power channels energy through you.
Effect: Unlock Magic (Pillar: Cosmos/Spirit). Huge Mana Pool but reaching 0 results in 'Burnout' (Stun/Unconscious).

Name: Regenerator
Effect: Heal 1 HP per minute out of combat.

Name: Lucky
Effect: Reroll one d20 roll per Long Rest.

Name: Night Eyes
Description: You can see in the dark.

Name: Cyber-Interface
Description: You have a port for direct data connection.

Name: Linguist
Description: You have a knack for tongues.

Name: Poor
Effect: Start with 0 Currency and only Rags.

Name: Mute
Effect: Cannot cast Verbal spells or communicate easily.

Name: Blind
Effect: Fail all Sight checks; Advantage on Hearing.
